```r
library(fitAutoReg)
set.seed(42)
```

## Parametric bootstrap

### Ordinary Least Squares


```r
system.time(
  pb <- PBootVAROLS(
    data = dat_p2,
    p = 2,
    B = 5000L,
    burn_in = 20
  )
)
#>    user  system elapsed 
#>   2.313   1.051   1.686
pb$est
#>           [,1]        [,2]        [,3]        [,4]        [,5]         [,6]
#> [1,] 0.7899726  0.36836768 0.008539283  0.02231498  0.11338780  0.024505442
#> [2,] 1.0001995  0.01334496 0.481949237 -0.01730029 -0.03223315  0.234373552
#> [3,] 1.0666814 -0.03022951 0.014945306  0.60741736 -0.01610408 -0.006149189
#>             [,7]
#> [1,] -0.01143384
#> [2,]  0.01815779
#> [3,]  0.29620975
```

#### Confidence Intervals



### Lasso Regularization


```r
system.time(
  pb <- PBootVARLasso(
    data = dat_p2,
    p = 2,
    B = 5000L,
    burn_in = 20,
    n_lambdas = 100,
    crit = "ebic",
    max_iter = 1000,
    tol = 1e-5
  )
)
#>     user   system  elapsed 
#> 3946.839  400.753 2182.785
pb$est
#>           [,1]      [,2]      [,3]      [,4]       [,5]      [,6]      [,7]

#> [3,] 1.0666814 0.0000000 0.0000000 0.5880327 0.00000000 0.0000000 0.2736337
```
